com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce
Class BaseConnectorType

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.BaseConnectorType

public class BaseConnectorType
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing the actual ConnectorType from the connector This class is the springframework UI component thats displayed on the GSA connector screen. It HTML form the connector shows and persists the data to the spring properties/config files

The get() set() defined here >>must<< match whats specified in connectorInstance.xml and connectorType.xml

 ConfigureResponse validateConfig(java.util.Map map, java.util.Locale locale, ConnectorFactory factory)
          Validates the configuration form thats submitted through the GSA At this time, all fields are required but in the future, we could verify the login credentials or any other param by actually invoking a salesforce login
